alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 6:55PM CST until March 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo. .Runoff from recent heavy rain has caused minor flooding on the lower Ohio River from Olmsted Lock and Dam to Cairo. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 37.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 40.0 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
